    Dagens boktips: Sometimes - A Life of Love, Loss & Erasure

    Jun 26, 2011



    Sometimes - A Life of Love, Loss & Erasure

    As partner and manager of Erasure front man, Andy Bell, Paul Hickey was living life too fast and in the wrong lane when he was struck down in a luxurious LA hotel suite by a crippling series of strokes that left him irreparably brain damaged. It was the start of a long, painful and exciting personal journal.

    Awakening from a coma to discover he was unable to move, swallow or communicate, he was suddenly forced to take stock of his life of sex, drugs and rock and roll and to rebuild it from scratch. The only way he could communicate in the early stages of his recovery was by writing, and this is his story.

    In this life-affirming true story, with echoes of The Diving Bell and the Butterfly by Jean-Dominique Bauby and The Naked Civil Servant by Quentin Crisp, Paul gives a heartrending account of how it feels to be struck down in the prime of life. From the prison of his hospital bed he looks back on how it felt to grow up poor in California, coming to terms with being gay, becoming a heavy drug user, arriving in London and falling in love with Andy. As he looks back he realises his life has been blessed and that he has been recklessly gambling with it. He also realises he has been given a final chance to put things right.

    The book gives powerful insights into how his and Andy’s lives together changed with the phenomenal success of Erasure in the late eighties and early nineties, with all the money, drugs and fast living that followed. In telling how their love story survived the pressures of fame, he realises just how powerful the bond between them is. As he struggles to return to a normal life, Paul is able to appreciate the extraordinary depth of Andy’s love and support.

    He paints a vivid picture of what it’s like to suffer a stroke and to suddenly find that everything in your life has changed forever; that even the simplest tasks like swallowing and speaking are suddenly beyond your control. In the telling of the story he provides hope and inspiration for anyone who has ever suffered such a problem, or knows someone who has. He shows how, with tenacity, courage and love, you can overcome almost any adversity and end up a better and stronger person for the experience.

    In the end it is a love story, and an uplifting and inspiring lesson in how seemingly impossible obstacles can still be overcome if you have enough determination - it is a gay Sid & Nancy, but with a happy ending.

    Dagens bokleverans: In The Plex av Steven Levy

    Apr 12, 2011

    Steven Levy √§r en av mina favoritf√∂rfattare.

    S√• n√§r jag s√•g att han efter sin bok om iPod var p√• g√•ng med en bok om Google, “In The Plex”, kastade jag mig p√• Amazons f√∂rhandsbokning f√∂r Kindle och i morse levererades den till alla mina enheter. S√• v√§ldigt 2011…

    Andra b√∂cker av Steven Levy: In The Plex: How Google Thinks, Works, and Shapes Our Lives (2011) The Perfect Thing: How the iPod Shuffles Commerce, Culture, and Coolness (2006) Crypto: How the Code Rebels Beat the Government Saving Privacy in the Digital Age (2001) Insanely Great: The Life and Times of Macintosh, the Computer That Changed Everything (1994) Artificial Life: The Quest for a New Creation (1992) The Unicorn’s Secret: Murder in the Age of Aquarius (1988) Hackers: Heroes of the Computer Revolution (1984)

    war is killing .ly - important update from letterly

    Apr 4, 2011

    Fick detta i mejlen precis.

    hello letterly authors, last week, the agency that we used to register the letter.ly domain was taken down as a side effect of the war in libya (.ly is the libyan top level domain). our domain registration expired, and we were unable to renew it. as the expiration propagated, the site appeared to be dead and emails sent to your subscribers probably bounced. 1) sorry for the hassle. it's amazing that a physical war has affected our service in this way. 2) we are now letterly.net. this means that you will send emails to secretcode@letterly.net instead of secretcode@letter.ly, and new subscribers should be directed to letterly.net/yoururl. if you have questions / comments / concerns, i am happy to address them. peace. - adam

    Invite to Happy Cog Hosting limited public beta

    Feb 18, 2011

In a nutshell, Happy Cog Hosting is industrial-grade, highly-optimized LAMP (Linux/Apache/MySQL/PHP) stack hosting designed for high profile sites with impressive traffic, backed by smokin‚Äô hot technology and unparalleled VIP service. It‚Äôs not for everyone, but it could be for you or someone you know.

    Happy Cog Hosting is in limited public beta for invited participants only.

    Locked in a Vegas Hotel Room with a Phantom Flex

    Feb 12, 2011

    Locked in a Vegas Hotel Room with a Phantom Flex from Tom Guilmette on Vimeo.

    I was working a gig in Vegas with a brand new Phantom Flex high speed digital cinema camera. I had to try it out. In fact, I never did go to bed that night. I opened up a wormhole shooting at 2,564 frames per second.

    Life: Bilden som r√§ddade Vanity Fair fr√•n nedl√§ggning

    Feb 12, 2011

    http://www.life.com/embed/index/image?id=ugc1169421

    Benson's picture of Ronald and Nancy Reagan dancing against a white backdrop is not only the best-known photograph of the president and first lady. "This," Benson told LIFE.com, "is the picture that saved Vanity Fair. That's not hearsay; it's documented fact. In 1985 Si Newhouse [the intensely private mogul behind The New Yorker, Vogue, Vanity Fair, and a score of other media properties] was going to close Vanity Fair, and the magazine's new editor, Tina Brown, pleaded with Newhouse to give the magazine one last chance -- because they had this photograph for the cover. Now, of course, people say the picture captures that era -- the Reagan Era -- better than any other. Maybe it does. But the point is," says Benson, "Vanity Fair survived, and this picture gave it a new lease on life. I know -- that sounds completely self-serving of me to say that. But it happens to be true."

    Life: Snart har Jesus huvudet p√• plats

    • POPMANI - En tidning att se fram emot.

    Garbo, Ingrid, Palme och Selma p√• nya Filmarkivet.se

    Feb 3, 2011

    Pressmeddelande fr√•n sfi.se: Roy Anderssons reklamfilm f√∂r pommes strips, Alice Babs sjunger tuggummit Toys lov, Ingrid Bergman och Roberto Rossellini g√§star filmgalan p√• Berns, Garbo gr√•ter n√§r hon l√§mnar Sverige, hemma hos-reportage hos Selma Lagerl√∂f.

    I ett samarbete mellan Svenska Filminstitutet och Kungliga biblioteket, blir √∂ver 300 filmer ur filmarkivet tillg√§ngliga p√• webbplatsen filmarkivet.se. Fr√•n den f√∂rsta svenska filmen till valfilmer och journalfilmer, till reklam- och informationsfilmer. Hundra √•rs historia i r√∂rlig bild finns tillg√§ngligt f√∂r allm√§nheten p√• internet.

    Den 10 februari lanseras den nya webbplatsen www.filmarkivet.se. Redan fr√•n start kommer webbplatsen att erbjuda √∂ver 300 streamade filmer och planeras sedan att v√§xa med lika m√•nga under √•ret.

    Det r√∂rliga bildmaterialet ur arkiven best√•r fr√§mst av kort-, dokument√§r-, journal- och reklamfilmer. Fr√•n den allra f√∂rsta svenska filmen, den 20 sekunder l√•nga Konungens av Siam landstigning vid Log√•rdstrappan fr√•n 1897, via de n√§stan bortgl√∂mda Paramount-journalerna (konkurrent till SF-journalen) till Folkpartiets reklamfilm inf√∂r valet 1994. Filmarkivet speglar ett svenskt √•rhundrade i f√∂rvandling och framv√§xten av dagens samh√§lle. M√•nga av stumfilmerna visas ackompanjerade av Matti Bye.

    F√∂rutom redan n√§mnda exempel kommer √§ven kortfilmer att finnas av Lennart Bernadotte, G√∂sta Werner och Maj Wechselman, stadsportr√§tt fr√•n hela Sverige, industrifilmer om tillverkning av allt fr√•n strumpor till plywood, amat√∂rdokument√§rfilmer fr√•n Falun och Malm√∂ vid h√∂gertrafikoml√§ggningen 1967, filmer med Ulla Billquist, Carl Larsson, Bruno Liljefors, Ingmar Bergman, valfilmer, dokumenterade tal av Per Albin Hansson och Olof Palme och mycket mera. I anslutning till filmerna finns √§ven m√§ngder med nyskrivna texter.

    • Designing Obama | Walker Channel Dubbed a “strategic and smart campaign” by Fast Company, the Obama “brand” has received much recognition not only within the design community, but also throughout the nation and abroad. Sol Sender and Scott Thomas, creators of the official Obama logo and Web site, will describe their experiences developing this historic political brand. The event features a special exhibition of posters from Threadless Loves Democracy, a challenge to design the most unique and conceptual call to vote, sponsored by Sappi Fine Paper, Threadless, Rock the Vote, and Jones Soda. The conversation will be moderated by Paul Schmelzer, editor of the Minnesota Independent news site, author of the blog Eyeteeth, and contributor to Adbusters, Cabinet, Ode, Utne Reader, and other journals focusing on the intersection of art, media, and politics.

    • Postmark – Email delivery for web apps Postmark helps deliver and track transactional emails for web applications. In a nutshell, the service replaces SMTP (or sendmail) with a far more reliable, scalable and care-free environment. In addition, you can track statistics for number of emails sent, bounces and spam complaints.

    • Apple kräver svensk tidningscensur - P1-morgon Datorföretaget Apple ställer krav på svenska medieföretag som vill lansera sina tidningar i läsplattan iPad. Nedsättande religionskritik, pornografi och förhärligande bilder på vapen får inte finnas i tidningarnas iPad-versioner. De stora svenska dagstidningarna har ändå valt att skriva på ett avtal där de förbinder sig att följa Apples riktlinjer. Agneta Lindblom Hulthén, svenska journalistförbundet (SJF) debatterar med Thomas Mattsson, chefredaktör för Expressen. Klockan 07:20.

    • Opera: State of the Mobile Web, Year-End 2010 Opera Software has released its State of the Mobile Web report for November 2010 today, but has also taken the opportunity to look back at the preceding months to summarize trends and statistics related to global mobile Web usage for 2010. The findings? Mobile Web surfing is way, way up.
    • Opera: State of the Mobile Web, November 2010 This month, the report reflects on a year of growth for Opera, but more importantly, growth for the mobile Internet. Passing milestone after milestone over the year, our users took the full Web experience to their hearts and browsed an incredible 340 billion pages in the first 11 months of 2010 (compared to 129 billion pages in the first 11 months of 2009).

    New York Times replaces Editor's Choice app with full content

    Oct 16, 2010

    New York Times replaces Editor’s Choice app with full content

    The New York Times has replaced its limited "Editor's Choice" iPad app with a new version that provides the newspaper's full content, pending the user's (free) registration. The app will be free for users until "early 2011."

    Bloomberg Game Changers: Steve Jobs - Video - Bloomberg

    Oct 16, 2010

    Bloomberg Game Changers: Steve Jobs - Video - Bloomberg

    Through interviews with friends, former colleagues and business associates, GAME CHANGERS reveals the many layers of the intensely private Steve Jobs - his style of leadership, management and creative process. Interviews include Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak, former Apple CEO John Scully, journalist turned Venture Capitalist Michael Moritz, Dreamworks CEO Jeffrey Katzenberg, former Apple "Mac Evangelist" and Silicon Valley Entrepreneur, Guy Kawasaki and Robert X.Cringely, technology journalist and former Apple employee.

    Noterat 2010-02-14

    Feb 15, 2010
    • Kraftwerk Action Figures - a set on Flickr
      My name's Dirk, I'm a sculptor from Germany. Well, I collect Kraftwerk records since about 1993. I'm a real fan of them! So in the year 2000 I've decided to sculpt them - just for myself. I've bought some old Mattel Ken figures (that guy from Barbie, you know) at flea markets, "decapitated" them and sculpted the Kraftwerk heads to apply them onto the bodies. First of all I sculpted them and then I built moulds and casted them with resin. Then I realized how hard it is to get some clothes for Ken - even in good toy stores! So I had to sew the red shirts and grey pants on my own - horrible work! Thank god I found some black shoes at the flea market! I've tried to get in contact with Kraftwerk by sending some photos of the dolls to Kraftwerk's former EMI manager, but there came no feedback at all - unfortunately! But I've expected that...
      (tags: Kraftwerk)

    I dag firar vi Alla hj√§rtans dag

    Feb 14, 2010

    Noterat 2010-01-05

    Jan 6, 2010
    • namebench
      Are you a power-user with 5 minutes to spare? Do you want a faster internet experience? Try out namebench. It hunts down the fastest DNS servers available for your computer to use. namebench runs a fair and thorough benchmark using your web browser history, tcpdump output, or standardized datasets in order to provide an individualized recommendation. namebench is completely free and does not modify your system in any way. This project began as a 20% project at Google.
      (tags: dns)

    H√§r kommer lite bilder fr√•n nya poddradiospelaren f√∂r iPhone - som har favorit- och historikfunktion.     Dave Gahan on Kraftwerk

    Feb 28, 2009

    There are some interesting sentences on Kraftwerk in an interview with Dave Gahan (Depeche Mode) in todays Rheinische Post: (German language)

    Translation: Q: "Did you know that Kraftwerk were once invited by David Bowie to support him on his US tour?" A: "Yes, but they didn't want to. Kraftwerk were no support band, they said. Nowadays they see it different." Q: "Why?" A: "Well, there was a wish to tour with us." Q: "So you're playing your forthcoming concerts with Kraftwerk?" A: "No, it wasn't realised. Kraftwerk isn't Kraftwerk anymore since Florian Schneider left".

    We have cut up the stage floor into 5107 pieces

    Feb 12, 2009

    On-Stage
    The stage floor, on which the great rock giants have stomped, has done its job.
    An era is going to the grave.
    The stage floor, on which the great rock giants have stomped, has done its job.
    The list of artists and performances is endless.
    We have cut up the stage floor into 5107 pieces. They say the floor remembers it all!

    On-Stage For Sale
    Every piece of stage floor is as unique as a fingerprint. Screen printed and mounted by hand. 
    Size: 23 x 23 centimetres. Price: 1350 SEK + freight. 
    A certificate of authenticity comes along with every piece and a corresponding number.

    The Story
    They say the vibrations in a wooden floor never disappear. The stomping of beats remains there for ever. The riff is hiding in the floorboards. The bass solo is engrained over several square metres. 
    Depeche Mode at Hovet, Stockholm in 1986; the whole concert is still in the stage floor. Metallica in Solnahallen in 1986, you can still hear Ecstacy of Gold if you put your ear to the floor. U2 at the Globe, Stockholm in 1992; Love is Blindness, Mysterious Ways, With or without you.
    The floor remembers it all; Guns¬¥N Roses, Tina Turner, Bob Dylan, Luciano Pavarotti, Sting, Frank Zappa, Sex Pistols, Eric Clapton, Aerosmith, Frank Sinatra, Nirvana, Elton John, Alice Cooper, Anastacia, Black Sabbath, Deep Purple, Duran Duran, Iron Maiden, Annie Lennox, Blur, Bon Jovi, Bruce Springsteen, Prince, Metallica, Crosby Stills &amp; Nash, Depeche Mode, Eminem, Joe Cocker, John Fogerty, Marilyn Manson, Mark Knopfler, Oasis, Paul McCartney, Phil Collins, Rod Stewart, Santana, Sex Pistols, Status Quo, U2. Just to mention a few.
    On the same stage Pope John Paul II led a midnight mass in 1989, one year later Nelson Mandela gave his first public speech after his release. The stage was also the platform for The Dalai Lama when he took part in a huge anti-violence manifestation in 1996.
    An era is going to the grave. The stage floor, on which the great rock giants have stomped, has done its job. The list of artists and performances is endless. We have cut up the stage floor into 5107 pieces. They say the floor remembers it all!

    Every piece of the stage floor, as unique as a fingerprint, numbered and mounted by hand with a protective cover of transparent plexi-glass, costs the same as a concert ticket. For 20 years of concerts.  Hang it up on the wall or lock it up in a safe place.

    The Producers
    Dave and “the Russian” met on the island of Ibiza in 1973. In a rock bar, where else? The Russian on holiday and Dave was a resident. That was the beginning of a friendship that was to build the Swedish rock music scene, literally. 
    Ivars “the Russian” Leimanis is Latvian and not in the least Russian. Born in the Stockholm South General Hospital when “Hovet” was still mainly a skating rink. Dave Edwards from England who on the wings of love, ended up in Sweden in 1981 and stayed, especially because of his friend from the bar in Ibiza. They were to work together for 27 years and still counting.
    At that time the “Russian” was working for EMA Telstar and soon Dave joined him. Dave remembers one of the first gigs he worked on , ZZ Top at G√∂ta Lejon in 1981. He met a guy backstage and told him enthusiastically about his new job ‚Äì dragging loudspeakers on to the stage. “And what do you do?”, he asked the guy. “I play guitar”, Billy Gibbons answered ‚Äì the Reverend Willie G ‚Äì a legend in ZZ Top.
    The breakthrough came in 1982, when the guys working for EMA, successfully steered the whole event of the Rolling Stones playing at Ullevi in Gothenburg ‚Äì the production, security, catering, lock, stock and barrel. One thing led to another (Rod Stewart, Bob Dylan, Bruce Springsteen and others) and in 1986, Event Service came to be with the five musketeers: the Russian, Dave, Tommy Ahl√©n, Tor Nielsen and Ingemar Larsson in partnership with EMA Telstar. The rest is Swedish rock concert history. Famous artists from the entire world have stamped the stage floor for 20 years. Rockt√•get, Rock runt riket, most of Roxette’s concerts in Sweden and so on.
    History also tells us how 17 centimetres can be the difference between a success and a fiasco: Elton John was to play at the Globe. His Production Manager inspected the height of the stage with his tape measure. According to the contract, the stage height  was to be 150 centimetres in height. It was 133 centimetres. “I’ll be back in a couple of hours”, he said, turned and left the arena. There was nothing else to do but to tear it down and re-build it.
    The last stage was built at the  Globe in 2006 for Red Hot Chilipepper. There’s a dent in the floor in piece nr 953, where they say the guitarist John Frusciantes knocked over his mike stand. Dave’s and the Russian’s stage floor has many such indentations.

    Kraftwerk co-founder Florian Schneider quits band

    Jan 6, 2009

    Lite sm√•tveksam till det h√§r. Kraftwerk kommer nog aldrig att officiellt kommentera det h√§r och att Reuters har en fansida p√• n√§tet som k√§lla, utan n√•gon mer h√§nvisning √§r lite tunt.

    LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - Florian Schneider, the co-founder of legendary German electronica band Kraftwerk, has quit the lineup, leaving it with just one original member.

    His departure was revealed Monday on Kraftwerk’s official fan Web site (http://kraftwerk.technopop.com.br/). No reason was given, but Schneider did not take part in Kraftwerk’s 2008 world tour as he is reportedly working on other projects.

    Ny iPhone-app fr√•n VinVin.se

    Sveriges Radio sl√§pper program till iPhone

    Dec 19, 2008

    Kraftwerk cancel gig due to heart failure - now updated with video

    Nov 22, 2008

    Updated with video.

    youtu.be/3hIzQU0rA…

    Just in from the Kraftwerk fan-list:

    I have just come from the Global Gathering concert in Melboourne where
    Kraftwerk were to have played tonight.

    Unfortunately the performance was cancelled and a very shocked looking
    Ralph came onstage to let everyone know that Fritz had suffered 'heart
    failure'.

    I know nothing more at this stage.

    My thoughts are with his family and the other members of Kraftwerk
    tonight.

    Carl Gamble
    Melbourne, Australia


    From Wikipedia: Fritz Hilpert replaced Wolfgang Fl√ºr in concert when Kraftwerk resumed their touring activities in 1990, and engineered the album The Mix, released in 1991. He has made musical contributions to Kraftwerk's compositions since Expo 2000 in 1999. Along with Henning Schmitz he works as sound engineer at Kling Klang studio and is administrator of the Kraftwerk.com and Klingklang.com websites.

    Poddsnack med Christian, Sveriges Radio - Del 2

    Nov 21, 2008

    Detta √§r del tv√• i ett poddsnack med Christian Gillinger, Sveriges Radio. H√§r finns del ett.

    Vad ser ni f√∂r trender inom podcasting? Sker det n√•gra teknikspr√•ng som g√∂r det enklare f√∂r vanliga d√∂dliga att producera podradio?
    Framf√∂rallt √§r jag nyfiken p√• det som Apple kallar “enhanced pod”, ett format med mer m√∂jligheter √§n det vanliga. Framf√∂rallt √§r jag som poddradioproducent intresserad av m√∂jligheten att indela poddfiler i kapitel, s√• att lyssnarna slipper sitta och spola i tv√•timmarss√§ndningar f√∂r att komma till r√§tt st√§llen. Jag tycker att id√©n med podcasting √§r lysande, men jag tycker formatet fortfarande √§r lite yxigt. Sen skulle jag √∂nska att det d√∂k upp lite fler enkla och snygga program f√∂r att prenumerera. De flesta som finns idag ser ut att vara gjorda f√∂r tekniker. Itunes √§r ett undantag, men samtidigt √§r det ett r√§tt stort steg att installera Itunes bara f√∂r att b√∂rja podda. Och jag hade g√§rna sett lite konkurrens.

    Kommer ni att titta p√• teknik liknande Soundclouds som g√∂r att man kan kommentera i och dela ljudfiler?
    Det finns inget inplanerat, men id√©n √§r inte dum. Eller, det formella svaret kanske √§r “Vi tittar p√• alla m√∂jligheter att distribuera v√•rt material”…

    Finns det planer p√• √∂ppet arkiv? Ni har ju t ex lagt upp ett urval av Spanarna-avsnitt fr√•n 20 √•r.
    Det √§r ju en rej√§lt stor fr√•ga, som hela SR (och SVT ocks√• kan jag t√§nka mig) brottas med. Jag skulle g√§rna tillg√§ngligg√∂ra hela SRs arkiv, det √§r ju r√§tt omfattande och en allt st√∂rre del b√∂rjar bli digital nu (mycket √§r ju fr√•n b√∂rjan inspelat p√• rullband och DAT). Det stora bekymret √§r r√§ttighetsfr√•gorna - det √§r mycket material som vi inte √§ger r√§ttigheterna till och d√• f√•r vi inte l√§gga upp det p√• n√§tet alls. Och allt som √∂verhuvudtaget ska ut i n√•gon form p√• n√§tet m√•ste f√∂rst r√§ttighetsklaras. SR Minnen (http://www.sr.se/cgi-bin/Mall/index.asp?programID=1602) √§r en digitalkanal som arbetar aktivt med att f√∂rs√∂ka f√• ut s√• mycket som m√∂jligt i radion, men just nu framf√∂rallt kanske p√• n√§tet och i deras tv√• podfl√∂den: SR Minnen och SR Minnen special (som √§r alldeles nytt).

    Era “poddradiokanaler” skiljer sig vad g√§ller metadata. Filnamnen ser helt olika ut, ibland finns det beskrivning, ibland inte. S√• det k√§nns som det √§r mycket handp√•l√§ggning med bakomsystem f√∂r att trycka ut poddradio. St√§mmer det och jobbar ni f√∂r att styra upp detta?
    Jo, det √§r n√•got som vi jobbar med… K√§llan till felet √§r v√§l kanske att vi √§r m√•nga, hundratals, som arbetar med att podda, b√•de internt inom SR men ocks√• alla de frist√•ende bolag som ocks√• levererar programinneh√•ll och poddinneh√•ll till oss. Jag har sikte p√• att uppdatera v√•r policy f√∂r namngivning, den b√∂rjar bli lite gammal och tar inte alltid fullt tillvara p√• de m√∂jligheter som dagens mp3 spelare har. Och vi f√∂rs√∂ker hitta b√§tte och enklare system f√∂r att f√• ut r√§tt metadata √∂verallt. Men ser det underligt ut n√•gonstans s√• dra er inte f√∂r att skicka ett mail till den poddande redaktionen.

    Vad √§r den vanligaste fr√•gan till Pod SR?
    “Hur g√∂r man” (se ovan) f√∂ljt av “Varf√∂r finns inte X som poddradio” (och d√§r √§r svaret oftast “av upphovsr√§ttsliga sk√§l”).

    Slutligen, ditt dr√∂mprogram att podda?
    Personligen skulle jag korka upp en flaska champagne om jag fick podda P3 Live.

    Poddsnack med Christian, Sveriges Radio - Del 1

    Nov 20, 2008

    Jag fick ett nyhetsbrev fr√•n Sveriges Radio med poddradionyheter som inleddes med “Jag heter Christian och t√§nkte f√∂rs√∂ka f√• lite liv i det h√§r poddnyhetsbrevet…” Klart man blir nyfiken p√• vad som h√§nder i radiohuset s√• jag drog iv√§g lite fr√•gor till Christian och fick √§ven hj√§lp fr√•n Jaiku-bubblan med n√•gra.

    Vem √§r du? Vad har du f√∂r bakgrund och hur ser dina uppgifter p√• SR ut?
    Christian Gillinger heter jag, √§r 37 √•r gammal och har precis slutat p√• P3, d√§r jag senast var gruppchef. Jag har arbetat p√• Sveriges Radio sedan pass -96, huvudsakligen som radioproducent. Sedan september √§r jag projektledare p√• SR Nya Medier och just nu √§r mitt huvudsakliga fokus f√∂rutom v√•r poddverksamhet, att √∂ka interaktiviteten p√• v√•ra hemsidor.

    N√§r b√∂rjade ni l√§gga ut program? Hur har utvecklingen f√∂r poddradion sett ut? Hur m√•nga prenumeranter finns det, mellan tummen och pekfingret? Vilka program √§r popul√§rast?
    Vi b√∂rjade 13 maj 2005. De f√∂rsta programmen ut var f√∂ljande tre: Ekots l√∂rdagsintervju i P1, Spanarna i P1 och Salva i P3. Det finns idag inget vettigt s√§tt att se antalet prenumeranter vad jag vet, d√§remot har vi sett att belastningen √∂kat p√• servrarna och att antalet fr√•gor till lyssnarservice om poddfilerna √∂kar lavinartat. Vilket √§r bra. Man kan ocks√• se ett trendskifte i attityden till podd - f√∂rut s√•gs det mer som n√•got kul, en bonus. Nu √§r det m√•nga lyssnare som ser det som ett huvudsakligt s√§tt att ta del av v√•ra s√§ndningar, n√•got som √∂kar kraven p√• tillg√§nglighet och p√• stabilitiet. Folk blir sura n√§r det av n√•gon anledning inte fungerar. Jag tycker det √§r bra att podcasting som distributionsform h√•ller p√• att mogna och att det b√∂rjar bli ett vardagsformat. Sett ur webbstatistiken s√• √§r nog P3 Dokument√§r, Spanarna, Sommar och Mammas Nya Kille de popul√§raste programmen.

    Hur anv√§nds podformatet internt p√• SR, har ni fler program som poddas d√§r √§n de som finns att tillg√• p√• sr.se?
    Vad jag vet har vi inga interna poddfl√∂den, allt vi har finns och l√§ggs automatiskt ut p√• v√•r poddsida (som √§r ny till form och inneh√•ll sedan f√∂rra fredagen).

    I dagarna har ju NRK l√∂st musikbiten genom ett avtal med Tono som betyder att 70% av deras material f√•r inneh√•lla musik. 42 minuter musik - och 18 minuter tal - p√• en timme. P√•g√•r det n√•gra diskussioner med STIM om detta s√• att programmen inte beh√∂ver klippas “s√∂nder”?
    Jag √§r grymt avundsjuk p√• NRK, att programmen m√•ste klippas √§r ju dels tr√•kigt eftersom det inte g√•r att erbjuda folk programmen s√•som det √§r t√§nkt att de ska h√∂ras, med musik. Men det inneb√§r ocks√• att flera program av resursk√§l inte kan poddas, redaktionen hinner helt enkelt inte klippa. Om diskussioner f√∂rs med STIM kan jag inte riktigt svara p√• - f√∂rhandlingarna mellan SR och upphovsr√§ttsorganisationer sk√∂ts av programsekretariatet, det vill s√§ga av v√•ra jurister. Jag hoppas att det g√∂rs det.

    Del tv√• publiceras p√• fredag. H√§r kan ni best√§lla nyhetsbrevet med poddradionyheter.

    Financial Times: Preview our new-look homepage

    Nov 10, 2008

    Just in from Financial Times:

    Here’s a sneak preview of our new-look homepage, which launches this week. We’re aiming for a more sophisticated look and feel that is consistent with the Financial Times brand - a clean and uncluttered executive briefing on the world of global business.

    This is the first step in a series of design changes and functional improvements that will be rolled out across the rest of the site as they become available. These include:

    • Expanded coverage of important subjects such as macroeconomics, energy and technology.
    • Better integration between market data and news, to give context to market movements.
    • More opportunities for users to become part of the Financial Times community by contributing to our discussion forums and blogs.
      Of course, many of the things we're working on we hope you'll hardly notice at all. Planned improvements to the behind-the-scenes nuts and bolts of our publishing system will make the site quicker and easier to use. Please bear with us while we get there. Take a look at it here.

    Hela listan: Mina plugins till Wordpress

    Oct 31, 2008

    Den h√§r listan har ibland haft 30+ plugins och ibland bara tv√•. Just nu ser den ut s√• h√§r men SimpleTags (f√∂r bloggar.se), Photo Dropper, UMapper och WP-Cumulus √§r ocks√• kul. Plugins √§r verkligen en smaksak och ibland √§r man sugen p√• godis och ibland √§r man proppm√§tt. F√∂r mycket plugins/godis kan ge h√•l i Wordpress/t√§nderna.

    Update: Deeped har en kanonlista som jag ska kasta mig √∂ver.

    Akismet Akismet checks your comments against the Akismet web service to see if they look like spam or not. You

    All in One SEO Pack Out-of-the-box SEO for your Wordpress blog.

    Clean Notifications Make e-mail notifications for new comments/pings cleaner and more readable.

    Easy Gravatars Add Gravatars to your comments, without requiring any modifications to your theme files.

    Google XML Sitemaps This plugin will generate a sitemaps.org compatible sitemap of your WordPress blog which is supported by Ask.com, Google, MSN Search and YAHOO.

    Instant Upgrade Upgrade your WordPress-Installation with one simple click.

    iWPhone A plugin and theme for WordPress that automatically reformats your blog‚Äôs content for optimized viewing on Apple‚Äôs iPhone and iPod touch.

    Microblog Updater Updates Twitter, Jaiku, and Pownce when you create, edit, or update a blog post. Update: H√§r har jag en spegling av pluginen.

    Search Unleashed Advanced search engine that provides full text searching across posts, pages, comments, titles, and URLs. Searches take into account any data added by other plugins, and all search results are contextually highlighted. You can also highlight incoming searches from popular search engines.

    Wordpress Automatic Upgrade Wordpress Automatic Upgrade allows a user to automatically upgrade the wordpress installation to the latest one provided by wordpress.org using the 5 steps provided in the wordpress upgrade instructions.i

    WordPress Mobile Edition Show a mobile view of the post/page if the visitor is on a known mobile device.

    New single by Sam Taylor-Wood, produced by Pet Shop Boys, is released

    Oct 29, 2008

    I M IN LOVE WITH A GERMAN FILM STAR
    http://mediaservices.myspace.com/services/media/embed.aspx/m=44675485,t=1,mt=video

    Highly-acclaimed artist and film-maker Sam Taylor-Wood releases the single “I’m In Love With A German Film Star” on Kompakt Records on October 27th. The single, a cover version of the post-punk classic by The Passions, was produced by Pet Shop Boys who also made a full length Symphonic mix. Other remixes available are by Gui Boratto, Juergen Paape and Mark Reeder. All mixes are now available through iTunes. Other digital sites, including Beatport, will sell the tracks from November 10th. CD release is on October 27th and the single is also available on limited edition 7” (500 numbered copies) and also 12” vinyl.

    Under tisdagen n√•dde SVT rekordsiffror p√• webben och slog nytt svenskt rekord n√§r det g√§ller live-streaming. √ñver 80 000 samtidiga tittare s√•g Stefan Holms h√∂jdhoppsfinal p√• svt.se.

    • Att s√• m√•nga v√§ljer att f√∂lja OS p√• webben visar att kombinationen lives√§ndningar, on demand och textbevakning √§r oerh√∂rt uppskattad, s√§ger Lena Glaser, chef f√∂r SVTi.

    SVT storsatsar under OS i Peking med mer √§n 700 timmar uts√§ndning i tv och p√• svt.se.     Under OS kan publiken f√∂lja dramatiken i en live-spelare p√• svt.se, som direkts√§nder s√§ndningarna i SVT1 och SVT24. Dessutom finns den exklusiva livekanalen Peking + som s√§nder lite mindre sporter som inte bevakas i huvuds√§ndningarna.

    Klipp, r√∂rliga sammandrag och intervjuer gav dessutom rekordtittning i SVT Play, med cirka 273 000 unika tittare. Det tidigare rekordet f√∂r ett dygn l√•g p√• 190 000.

    Aug 18, 2008

    Check Out Our New ‚ÄúEmbed Video‚Äù Feature: At CNN.com, we‚Äôre always working to enhance and improve the video experience for YOU, our consumers. We are very happy to announce our latest move in that effort with the introduction of the CNN.com embeddable video player, a stand-alone video player that can be virally distributed by using a code snippet to embed on almost any site or blog that you choose. For the time being, the player is limited to a single clip and available in the player size, 384x216. We‚Äôve also added a share feature to allow you to share videos on your favorite social networking sites like Facebook and MySpace.

    See something you like and want to share it with others? Just click on the button on the video player that says ‚Äòembed this video‚Äô. Then, you will see a message allowing you to copy the embed code to place on your site. And, just like that, you‚Äôve embedded CNN.com video! Or click on the share button and select a site from the list on which you‚Äôd like to share a video link .We hope you enjoy these latest features ‚Äì let us know what you think!

    Testar den nya tj√§nsten Dropbox som g√∂r att man kan ha en mapp p√• n√§tet, ute i “molnet” som hela tiden uppdateras mot en lokal mapp p√• datorn. Fungerar fantastiskt bra p√• mac. Dessutom kan man dela ut mappen till sina v√§nner om man vill.

    MySQL har haft 100 miljoner nedladdningar fr√•n sajten.

    I januari s√•ldes MySQL till IT-j√§tten Sun f√∂r respektingivande en miljard dollar. Grundartrion, bl a David Axmark, gick lyckligt lottade ur aff√§ren med sina 20 % i bolaget.

    Linda Skugge, VD, vulkan.se: ‚ÄùDet √§r fantastiskt att en s√• stor IT-profil som David Axmark vill vara med p√• den h√§r resan.     F√∂r f√∂rsta g√•ngen p√• l√§nge √§r de “fria” och kan skriva loss, i princip hur de vill. St√§mmer ju faktiskt ganska bra. Mark Gimein har g√§stbloggat en vecka p√• time.com och har kommit fram till:

    Journalists love blogging because it lets them cut loose: “Journalists love doing this in part because over the years they have been pushed to squeeze more and more of the viewpoint and analysis out of their writing in the name of objectivity. So the blog lets them cut loose. It gives them a satisfaction that’s hard to get from doing original reporting, and it’s much easier than doing original reporting as well. And it lets them feel like they’re part of a community, “the blogosphere.”

    (Via Romenesko.)

    Bloggv√§rldsbloggen: Nu kan du l√§sa Aftonbladet Blogg i mobilen

    Jul 25, 2007
    Nu finns en länk till Blogg på Aftonbladets mobilsajt mobil.aftonbladet.se. Där kommer du åt både de redaktionella bloggarna och andra bloggar på Aftonbladet Blogg.

    Du kan √§ven skicka ett SMS med texten: aftonbladet (mellanslag) surfa till 72600 s√• f√•r du ett SMS med l√§nken till Aftonbladet i mobilen (kostar 3 kr + trafikavgift). Du kan l√§sa vilken blogg som helst i mobilen. Byt bara ut det inledande blogg i adressen mot mblogg. Till exempel Alex Schulmans blogg, som p√• webben har adressen [blogg.aftonbladet.se/14002/.]([blogg.aftonbladet.se](http://blogg.aftonbladet.se/)14002/.) I mobilen f√•r samma blogg adressen [mblogg.aftonbladet.se/14002.](http://mblogg.aftonbladet.se/14002.) För att komma direkt till listningen över senast skrivet och kommenterat mobilsurfar du till mblogg.aftonbladet.se.
    Och vill du direkt till din egen blogg går du till mblogg.aftonbladet.se/X där X är ditt blogg-id (siffrorna direkt efter [blogg.aftonbladet.se](http://blogg.aftonbladet.se/) i adressfältet när du är på din blogg). Bloggvärldsbloggen hittar du med andra ord på mblogg.aftonbladet.se/1

    Tyvärr går det inte att kommentera i mobilen, men det är i alla fall ett smidigt sätt att läsa ikapp lite bloggtexter när du inte har tillgång till datorn....

    L√§s mer av det h√§r p√• Bloggv√§rldsbloggen

    paidContent.org: Online Newspaper Audience Rising Twice As Fast As General Internet Population: Report

    Jul 24, 2007

    Newspapers’ online audiences are rising at twice the rate of the general internet audience, according to research by Nielsen//NetRatings for the Newspaper Association of America. The research is being used to back up a recent industry ad campaign undertaken by the NAA called Newspaper: The Multi-Medium. The goal is to attract marketers to newspaper websites based on the apparent sophistication and earning power of those particular readers when compared to average web surfers.

    L√§s mer av det h√§r p√• paidContent.org

    Jul 24, 2007

    Most shows are rips from preview and review DVDs sent out by the studios to several media outlets and TV editors.     The Sarah Connor Chonicles, Pushing Daisies, Californication, and Dexter are new TV shows that are about to start on their first season.     Hur har reaktionerna fr√•n l√§sarna varit efter att du slutade blogga? - Jag f√•r otroligt mkt mail just nu fr√•n folk som har linda-abstinens, som inte vet hur de ska klara sig utan att l√§sa mina blogginl√§gg om coop! haha!

    Nu har du inte bloggat p√• p√• tolv timmar. Hur k√§nns det? - Hela dagen har varit mkt underlig. Jag har t√§nkt oavbrutet p√• bloggen. Jag m√•ste f√∂rs√∂ka t√§nda av p√• n√•t s√§tt.

    N√•gon abstinens? - Ja mkt.

    Nyhetss√§ndningar fr√•n SR Ekot och Sveriges Radios lokala kanaler b√∂rjar poddas med start idag. Fr√•n SR Ekot erbjuds dagligen flera nyhetss√§ndningar, d√§ribland Morgonekot, Kvart i fem och Ekonomiekot.

    Podden g√∂r att den som alltid vill vara uppdaterad nu har ytterligare en m√∂jlighet att lyssna till Ekot, s√§ger Cilla Benk√∂, redaktionschef p√• SR Ekot.

    √Ñven Sveriges Radios 25 lokala kanaler erbjuder fr√•n och med idag nyheter som poddradio, vilket g√∂r deras angel√§gna lokala bevakning medtagbar p√• ett s√§tt den aldrig tidigare varit.

    "De riktigt stora r√§kningarna fr√•n mitt Music Store-konto kommer f√∂rst√•s n√§r jag har nostalgifrossa. Jag menar, det √§r ju fullkomligt tydligt att Cutting Crew √§r det nya Pink Floyd n√§r Mika tar √∂ver efter Scissor Sisters., eller n√•t."

    (Via roger wilson.)

    An Inside Look at Google

    Jul 16, 2006
    [video.google.com/googlepla...](http://video.google.com/googleplayer.swf?docId=-8618166999532839788)
    I've represented Google at many events for women in engineering, and I'm always asked the same thing: "What's it like to work there?" I certainly don't mind discussing the subject, but I often think it would be great if more people could see it for themselves. Well, now you can. We invite you to take a sneak peek inside Google and hear straight from some of our female engineers what life here is really like. Of course, our goal of recruiting as many gifted female engineers as we can also means encouraging young women who are still in school. So I'd like to issue a hearty congrats to the winners of this year's Anita Borg scholarships. - Jen Fitzpatrick, Engineering Director, Google

    New York Times launches free daily podcast

    Feb 2, 2006

    New York Times launches free daily podcast: "The New York Times has launched a free daily podcast hosted by one of its reporters, James Barron, which will be a round-up of the day's top stories. The podcast is currently only available via i-Tunes.' Source: Micro Persuasion'"

    BBC News Interactive to launch editors‚Äô blog

    Feb 2, 2006

    BBC News Interactive to launch editors' blog: "BBC News Interactive is set to launch a BBC wide editors' blog, with the objective of revealing the reasoning behind editorial decisions. Pete Clifton, head of BBC News Interactive said the blog will help the media organisation fulfil its requirement of being 'open and accountable' to its readers. He added: 'It's a different world: we're more open about what we do. Even if we get it wrong it's good to have the conversation about why.' Source: journalism.co.uk'"

    (Via Editors Weblog - all postings.)

    Newspapers Get a Jump on Death With Pre-Written Obits

    Jan 28, 2006

    Newspapers Get a Jump on Death With Pre-Written Obits

    US: Los Angeles Times converges

    Jan 28, 2006

    US: Los Angeles Times converges: "Online content producers at The Los Angeles Times will be moving to 'regular newsroom departments' such as national, foreign, or business, reports Frank Barnako of Market Watch in his newsletter. Additionally, Joel Sapell, executive editor/interactive at the paper, announced that the paper's online department will be putting a focus on delivering more to the reader: 'We need to create a different kind of online news operation, one that recognises the changing expectations of readers who consume news on the Internet.' To achieve these aims, web reporters will have to: 'think creatively every day about the extras we can give online visitors so they can stick around our site longer.'Source: Market Watch '"

    (Via Editors Weblog - all postings.)

    Guardian: Google Pack is an embarrassing mess

    Jan 10, 2006
    Over at WinSupersite, Paul Thurrott has reviewed the Google Pack software bundle (Windows only), and is not impressed. It's obviously a ragbag of applications, but some of them are out of date, and it doesn't deliver the claimed convenience. He concludes: "Google Pack is still in beta, so the more glaring issues can be fixed by a final release, if there is one. But this initial version of Google Pack is an embarrassment to the company. It's just a mess."

    Writers Block Live: Adobe Releases Public Beta of Lightroom!

    Jan 9, 2006

    Turns out the rumors were true. Today Adobe released a public beta for Lightroom, their new Aperture-like application for photographers. I spent an hour or so playing with it, and am quite impressed. There are some features missing, but I expect Adobe will correct that before release. Overall it seems quite useable; and snappy.

    <p><br />

    The Lightroom interface has something vaguely familiar about it.

    <p>You can <a href="http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop-lightroom.html" target="_blank">get the beta here</a>.</p>

    "Bottom falls out of thong market" - The Sunday Times, UK

    cityofsound: New Musical Experiences

    Jan 4, 2006

    Below, the written-up and expanded notes for a talk I gave at a seminar called 'The Future of Music' at the Sibelius Academy, Helsinki. This followed a talk by John Kieffer, in his last speaking engagement as Head of Music for the British Council (his talk is progressed in this subsequent article by John in his current position at AEA).

    I've written more or less what I spoke about, although it's developed into more of a 'paper' than was originally intended and is now more cityofsound than BBC. The audience was music educators, music technologists, musicians, researchers and cultural policy makers. This talk, like many I give, was concerned with describing an emerging terrain for the largely...

    L√§s mer av det h√§r p√• cityofsound

    New Media Musings: 2005 - Year of the Digital Citizen

    L√§s mer av det h√§r p√• New Media Musings

    New Media Musings: Moblogged photo nominated TIME best photo

    Jan 1, 2006

    Michael Tippett of NowPublic notes that a 'moblogged' photo was nominated as a best photo of the year by Time magazine -- the emblematic shot taken by Adam Stacey with his camera phone minutes after a terrorist bomb went off in the London subway.

    It's pretty stunning that Gamma would reproduce the image without Stacey's permission. Maybe they'll know now that a work licensed under Creative Commons doesn't mean it's fair game for commercial use.

    Adds Tippett:

    We are quickly approaching a time when all big stories will be broken by citizen reporters and these accidental bystanders will need tools that let them distribute their work to news organizations while still protecting their rights. This...

    L√§s mer av det h√§r p√• New Media Musings

    LibriVox: free audiobooks

    Dec 23, 2005

    LibriVox volunteers record chapters of books in the public domain, and then we release the audio files back onto the net (podcast and catalog). Our objective is to make all books in the public domain available, for free, in audio format on the internet. We are a totally volunteer, open source, free content, public domain project.

    (Via Junk Musik.)

    New Order Information Service: Joy Division to record new material

    Dec 19, 2005
    New Order are working on new material for the long-awaited biopic of former Joy Division singer Ian Curtis. Director and celebrated rock photographer Anton Corbijn - most renowned for his work with U2 - has asked the legendary Manchester four-piece to contribute songs to the film 'Control'. The biopic, which is based on a book by Ian's widow Deborah, had been planned for a number of years, but the late singer's family were never happy with the proposals until earlier this year. Bassist Peter Hook told NME: "We were asked to do the soundtrack to the film which I thought was a fucking great idea, for Joy Division to do the music for a Joy Division film because we've never really done a...

    Supergroup looking for singer

    Nov 25, 2005
    Members of New Order, Stone Roses and The Smiths search for vocalist Freebass - a supergroup consisting of New Order's Peter Hook, The Smiths' Andy Rourke and The Stone Roses Mani - are on the lookout for a singer. The band are looking to complete their line-up with a fresh face. "We want someone young with something to say. Someone new," Peter Hook told filer-mag.com. "I think the problem is that the three of us have such a pedigree of vocalist, that if we come out with someone that's not good we'll obviously be slated! You've got Ian Brown, bloody Bobby Gillespie, Ian Curtis, Bernard (Sumner) and Morrissey. Those are big shoes to fill, especially collectively," he said....

    fuffenz.webalbum.se: ber har g√•tt bort

    Nov 14, 2005

    nic.se meddelar att Björn Eriksen har avlidit. Namnet säger kanske inte så mycket för de flesta internetanvändare, men för oss som varit med ett tag är detta en riktigt tråkig nyhet. De flesta kallade honom "ber" eftersom det var hans loginnamn och man vande sig vid att maila till ber@sunet.se.

    1983 kopplade ber ett modem till den dator som blev den första i Sverige att anslutas till EUnet. Han tog emot ett mail från Jim McKie i Amsterdam och det som skulle bli den svenska delen av Internet var i drift.

    Eldsjälen ber ansökte 1986 om toppdomänen .se och blev därmed också ansvarig för den (rent formellt var faktiskt .se hans egen domän!).

    <font...

    Läs mer av det här på fuffenz.webalbum.se

    Kl 21.10 - Movitz √§r h√§r

    Nov 1, 2005

    Kl. 21.10 kom Movitz! Alla mår bra efter en supersnabb förlossning. Han är hårig, skön med två smilgropar och äter allt vad han kan. 3300 gram landade vågen på och 50 cm lång. Hillevi och lillkillen gosar säkert hela natten, själv känns det lite konstigt att åka hem till en sovande storebror fast vi ses ju snart igen.

    Krokodil-folk man tr√§ffar

    Oct 30, 2005

    Mannen som bl√•ste alla tr√§der fram i Svensk Bokhandel

    Oct 27, 2005

    Det är årets mest omtalade blogg. Varenda sportjournalist värd namnet har spekulerat över vem som legat bakom den. Alla sportjournalister värda namnet har blivit utpekade. Men Mats Hård, pseudonymen bakom bloggen thefineartoflosing, har lurat dem alla. Det som var vårens stora internet-hype var från första stund ett romanbygge signerat Olle Svalander. Nu träder han fram i Svensk Bokhandel.

    Pelle Wendel d√∂d

    Oct 12, 2005

    Egentligen ska man väl skriva någonting personligt men det vore hyckleri att säga att jag kände Pelle. Jag gillade honom, han frågade mycket om webben, teknik och iPods. Han ville veta allt. Hur man gjorde, vilken som var bäst. Och han lyssnade och lärde sig snabbare än de flesta. Framtiden får utvisa vad jag lärde mig av honom.

    Expressen: Han jobbade ända till slutet.

    Bo Strömstedt: Det fanns ett leende hos Pelle.

    Resumé: “Wendel var superstjärnan som gjorde allt”

    Johannes Forsberg: R.I.P Per Wendel

    NerdTV

    Sep 8, 2005

    NerdTV - PBS :“Andy Hertzfeld, the original Macintosh systems programmer, talks about MacHistory and how he fell in love with Open Source software.

    NerdTV is a new weekly online TV show from PBS.org technology columnist Robert X. Cringely. NerdTV is essentially Charlie Rose for geeks - a one-hour interview show with a single guest from the world of technology. Guests like Sun Microsystems co-founder Bill Joy or Apple computer inventor Steve Wozniak are household names if your household is nerdy enough, but as historical".

    Segwaying across the USA

    Aug 18, 2005

    Verkar vara en kanonfilm!.

    Two guys quit stodgy corporate jobs, scrounged up all the savings they could, collected credit cards, and stepped - or better yet - scooted forward to follow their biggest dream: to become filmmakers. Josh Caldwell rode a Segway from Seattle to Boston, while his buddy Hunter Weeks directed a film they both shot about the experience and about the moments leading up to this crazy twist on the American road trip. From cubicle farms to the open road, the film will chronicle how these guys ultimately changed their lives forever. They did what so many of us have always wanted to do - gave it all up for the passion inside.

    Dansen kring guldkalven

    Jul 14, 2005

    Ny bok om it-√•ren i Sverige..

    Dansen kring guldkalven √§r en bok om dr√∂mmar. Dr√∂mmar som gick i kras n√§r luften gick ur b√∂rsen kring millennieskiftet 1999/2000. Somliga dr√∂mde om snabba pengar och evig tillv√§xt p√• en aktieb√∂rs som tycktes skapa guld av n√§stan ingenting. Andra dr√∂mde om en ny sorts arbetsplatser, som till√§t m√§nniskor att ta verkligt ansvar, men ocks√• rymde vilda fester. Dansen kring guldkalven √§r hela historien om den galna b√∂rsbubblan. Boken utkommer den 15 augusti

    Vi har gift oss!

    Jul 12, 2005

    Vi slog till på midsommardagen 2005 i en liten kyrka på Björkö som heter Björkö Arholma Kyrka i Roslagen. Prästen Lars-Åke Pihl var kanon och allt var väldigt fint. Hillevi skrev en krönika i Metro om vigseln. Vi kommer att lägga ut fler bilder på gunnar.se/wedding/

    Jag √ÑLSKAR Ikea!

    Jul 10, 2005

    Pust. Nu har vi flyttat. Jag hade lyckats få ihop sex tappra vänner som skulle hjälpa till att bära men tyvärr så föll tre ifrån, jobb, privata problem etc etc. Sånt som händer såklart. Så vi blev tre tappra och jävlar vad vi flyttade.

    Som en parantes så hatar jag Statoil. Hade bokat en lastbil på Östermalmstorg för två veckor sedan. Var flytthelg i helgen så hela Stockholm var tomt på lastbilar men jag lyckades boka en till kl 13 på lördagen. Kom till Statoil kl 13.15. Stängt. Men varför i helvete sa ni inte att ni stängde kl 13??? Där på gatan står Min Lastbil men jag kan inte hämta den. Ringer Statoils Talsvar. “Vill du hyra lastbil, säg “Lastbil”. Jag står och skriver “LAAAASTBIL” i en telefon. Sen skriker jag “Stockholm”. Sen skriker jag “Gärdet”. Kopplas. Har inga. Ringer igen. “LAAAAASTBIL”. “Stockholm”. “Jaaaaarlaplan”. Kopplas. Har ingen. Ringer igen. “LAAAAASTBIL”. “STOCKHOLM”. “GE MIG EN ÖPPEN JÅÄVLA STATION”.

    “Förlåt jag uppfattade inte ditt val. Sa du “Östermalmstorg?”

    Till slut kom jag fram till en station där de kunde hitta en “Lastbil fyra” i Högdalen. “Jag tar den”. Ringer Högdalen. Bokar den till kl 17.30. Åker hem och bär ner kartonger till förbannelse. Åker till Högdalen. Hämtar. Etc etc etc. Kl 22 är den full. Åker till Orvar Odds Väg 8, nya adressen, och börjar tömma. Blir klar mitt i natten. Kl 11 på söndagen ska lastbilen vara tillbaka.

    Jaja. Men så var det de här med Ikea och bokhyllor. Det saknas skruvar, pluggar och skit. Blir galen. Måste sova.

    Måndag morgon. Ringer Ikea och är beredd på att betala vad som helst för en plugg. Trycker fyra för bokhyllor. Tvåa för privat. Får prata med Madde på Ikea. Berättar att jag har en t-shirt med texten “Ett kungarike för en plugg” på mig.

    Behöver du dem i dag? Nja… Nä. I morgon går ju bra. Men vad kostar det? Bokhyllan kostar en tusenlapp så pluggarna kostar väl 950 spänn?

    Nejdå, jag skickar dem med posten i dag. Gratis.

    Kan du skicka med en monteringsanvisning också?

    Absolut.

    Och tålamod.

    Skickar det också.

    Tack.

    Jag ÄLSKAR Ikea.

    Och HATAR Statoil på Östermalmstorg som kan hyra ut en lastbil till kl 13 UTAN att tala om att de stänger kl 13…

    Pust.

    Det här är sista gången som min generation flyttar. Elliot och Movitz (kommer i oktober), ni få ta över det här. Och behöver ni hjälp med något, ring Madde på Ikea.

    Band To Band Links

    Jul 27, 2004

    A band is officially regarded as connecting to another if they both share a legitmate band member (as opposed to guest appearances) who played on a particular band recording which was released publically as either an offical band album or as a compilation appearance. “Band To Band Links”

    Utst√§llning med Peter Saville

    May 12, 2003

    Peter Saville, one of the most influential designers working today, is best known to Suede fans for his artwork on Coming Up and Head Music. A cult in both graphic design and pop culture for the last 25 years, Saville was art director at the legendary factory Records where he collaborated with Joy Division and New Order. London’s Design Museum is holding the first ever retrospective of his work, The Peter Saville Show, from May 23rd until September 14th.

    Omst√§ndigt men kul om det funkar

    Aug 19, 2002

    Fax-like utility for sending CDROMs. CDFax is a command-line Linux utility for “fax-like transfer of CDs.” Two people run the software. The receiver loads a CD blank in his burner, and the sender puts a CD to be sent in her drive. The sender enters a brief command that specifies the receiver’s IP address and the disk is imaged, sent, and burned at the remote end.
